languages.text: "Техножрецы, занятые ритуалами успокоения машинных духов, по-прежнему уверены, что причина кроется в их строптивости и непокорности. Из отчетов Механикус следует, что произошедшие инциденты не выходят за рамки штатных ситуаций. В последние дни число сообщений о неисправном термоконтроле значительно снизилось, но среди экипажа ползут слухи, будто наш корабль одержим злыми призраками. От заверений техножрецов, что виной всему норов машинных духов, эти глупые кривотолки только множатся".

traits.locale_text: "Техножрецы, занятые ритуалами успокоения машинных духов, по-прежнему уверены, что причина кроется в их строптивости и непокорности. Из отчетов Механикус следует, что произошедшие инциденты не выходят за рамки штатных ситуаций. В последние дни число сообщений о неисправном термоконтроле значительно снизилось, но среди экипажа ползут слухи, будто наш корабль одержим злыми призраками. От заверений техножрецов, что виной всему норов машинных духов, эти глупые кривотолки только множатся".

languages.text: "The Tech-Priests are performing the rites of machine spirit pacification and remain convinced that the issues were caused by the spirits' obstinacy and defiance. Their reports claim the incidents remain well within the scope of expected performance parameters. Over the last few days, complaints about the malfunctioning thermal controls have dwindled, but the crew members have started whispering that our vessel is haunted. The Tech-Priests' assurances that only the machine spirits' tempers are to blame are doing nothing to dissuade these ridiculous rumours."

traits.locale_text: "The tech-priests are performing the rites of machine spirit pacification and remain convinced the issues were caused by their rebelliousness and defiance. The Mechanicus' reports claim the incidents remain within the scope of routine performance. Over the last few days the complaints about the malfunctioning thermal controls have dwindled, but the crew members have started whispering that our vessel is haunted. The tech-priests' assurances that only the temper of the machine spirits is to blame are doing nothing to dissuade the ridiculous rumours."

languages.text: « Les technoprêtres accomplissent les rituels d'apaisement des esprits de la machine qui, ils en sont convaincus, nous expriment ainsi leur opiniâtreté et leur défiance. Les derniers rapports du Mechanicus se veulent néanmoins rassurants, car la gravité des incidents reste bien en deçà des marges d'erreur opérationnelles. Le nombre de plaintes au sujet du contrôle thermique a décliné ces derniers jours, mais une rumeur a commencé à courir parmi l'équipage : notre vaisseau serait hanté. Et les technoprêtres ont beau répéter que le problème provient de l'humeur changeante des esprits de la machine, cela ne fait qu'apporter de l'eau au moulin de ces bruits de coursives ridicules. »
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priests are performing the rites of machine spirit pacification and remain convinced that the issues were caused by the spirits' obstinacy and defiance. The reports from Mechanicus claim the incidents remain well within the scope of expected performance parameters. Over the last few days, complaints about the malfunctioning thermal controls have dwindled, but the crew members have started whispering that our vessel is haunted. The Tech-Priests' assurances that only the machine spirits' tempers are to blame are doing nothing to dissuade these ridiculous rumours."

traits.locale_text: « Les technoprêtres accomplissent les rituels d'apaisement des esprits de la machine qui, ils en sont convaincus, nous expriment ainsi leur opiniâtreté et leur défiance. Les derniers rapports du Mechanicus se veulent néanmoins rassurants, car la gravité des incidents reste bien en deçà des marges d'erreur opérationnelles. Le nombre de plaintes au sujet du contrôle thermique a décliné ces derniers jours, mais une rumeur a commencé à courir parmi l'équipage : notre vaisseau serait hanté. Et les technoprêtres ont beau répéter que le problème provient de l'humeur changeante des esprits de la machine, cela ne fait qu'apporter de l'eau au moulin de ces bruits de coursives ridicules. »

languages.text: “技术神甫正在进行机魂安抚仪式，他们认为，这些事故是由于机魂拒绝服从命令造成的。他们的报告声称，即便发生了此类事故，飞船整体性能依然在预期参数范围内。在过去的几天里，关于热控系统失灵的投诉渐渐少了，但船员们开始窃窃私语，说我们的飞船闹鬼了。技术神甫保证，说这场事故完全是由于机魂发脾气造成的，但他们的保证无法打消那些荒谬的传言。”
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priests are performing the rites of machine spirit pacification and remain convinced that the issues were caused by the spirits' obstinacy and defiance. Their reports claim the incidents remain well within the scope of expected performance parameters. Over the last few days, complaints about the malfunctioning thermal controls have dwindled, but the crew members have started whispering that our vessel is haunted. The Tech-Priests' assurances that only the machine spirits' tempers are to blame are doing nothing to dissuade these ridiculous rumours."

traits.locale_text: “技术神甫正在进行机魂安抚仪式，他们认为，这些事故是由于机魂拒绝服从命令造成的。他们的报告声称，即便发生了此类事故，飞船整体性能依然在预期参数范围内。在过去的几天里，关于热控系统失灵的投诉渐渐少了，但船员们开始窃窃私语，说我们的飞船闹鬼了。技术神甫保证，说这场事故完全是由于机魂发脾气造成的，但他们的保证无法打消那些荒谬的传言。”

languages.text: "Die Techpriester führen Rituale zur Befriedung der Maschinengeister aus und sind weiterhin überzeugt, dass die Probleme durch die Sturheit und den Trotz der Geister entstanden sind. Den Mechanicus-Berichten zufolge liegen die Zwischenfälle im Rahmen der erwarteten Leistungsparameter. In den letzten Tagen gibt es immer weniger Meldungen über Fehlfunktionen der Temperaturkontrolle. Dafür flüstern die Crewmitglieder nun, dass es auf unserem Schiff spukt. Die Beteuerungen der Techpriester, dass die Ursache nur das Temperament der Maschinengeister war, tun den hanebüchenen Gerüchten keinen Abbruch."
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priests are performing the rites of machine spirit pacification and remain convinced that the issues were caused by the spirits' obstinacy and defiance. The reports from Mechanicus claim the incidents remain well within the scope of expected performance parameters. Over the last few days, complaints about the malfunctioning thermal controls have dwindled, but the crew members have started whispering that our vessel is haunted. The Tech-Priests' assurances that only the machine spirits' tempers are to blame are doing nothing to dissuade these ridiculous rumours."

traits.locale_text: "Die Techpriester führen Rituale zur Befriedung der Maschinengeister aus und sind weiterhin überzeugt, dass die Probleme durch die Sturheit und den Trotz der Geister entstanden sind. Den Mechanicus-Berichten zufolge liegen die Zwischenfälle im Rahmen der erwarteten Leistungsparameter. Die Beteuerungen der Techpriester, dass die Ursache nur das Temperament der Maschinengeister war, tun den hanebüchenen Gerüchten keinen Abbruch."

languages.text: «Los tecnosacerdotes están realizando ritos de pacificación con los espíritus máquina y siguen convencidos de que la causa de los problemas es la obstinación y resistencia de los espíritus. Sus informes afirman que los incidentes se encuentran dentro de los límites de los parámetros de rendimiento previstos. Estos últimos días, las quejas sobre el mal funcionamiento de los controles térmicos han disminuido, pero los tripulantes empiezan a creer que nuestra nave está poseída. Las declaraciones de los tecnosacerdotes de que la causa de esto solo se le puede atribuir al estado de ánimo de los espíritus máquina no ayudan a acallar estos ridículos rumores».
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priests are performing the rites of machine spirit pacification and remain convinced that the issues were caused by the spirits' obstinacy and defiance. Their reports claim the incidents remain well within the scope of expected performance parameters. Over the last few days, complaints about the malfunctioning thermal controls have dwindled, but the crew members have started whispering that our vessel is haunted. The Tech-Priests' assurances that only the machine spirits' tempers are to blame are doing nothing to dissuade these ridiculous rumours."

traits.locale_text: «Los tecnosacerdotes están realizando ritos de pacificación con los espíritus máquina y siguen convencidos de que la causa de los problemas es la obstinación y resistencia de los espíritus. Sus informes afirman que los incidentes se encuentran dentro de los límites de los parámetros de rendimiento previstos. Estos últimos días, las quejas sobre el mal funcionamiento de los controles térmicos han disminuido, pero los tripulantes empiezan a creer que nuestra nave está poseída. Las declaraciones de los tecnosacerdotes de que la causa de esto solo se le puede atribuir al estado de ánimo de los espíritus máquina no ayudan a acallar estos ridículos rumores».

languages.text: 「技術司祭達が機械精霊を鎮める儀式を執り行っており、問題が起きた原因はやはり精霊が頑固に反抗したせいだと確信したそうです。技術局の報告によると、今回の騒動は局が介入すべきボーダーを超えてはいないとのことでした。ここ数日、温度管理装置の不具合いに関する苦情は減りましたが、この船には幽霊が出るとクルー達は噂しています。技術司祭は不具合の原因は機械精霊の機嫌に他ならないと断言していますが、この馬鹿馬鹿しい噂を止める役には立っていません」
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priests are performing the rites of machine spirit pacification and remain convinced that the issues were caused by the spirits' obstinacy and defiance. Their reports claim the incidents remain well within the scope of expected performance parameters. Over the last few days, complaints about the malfunctioning thermal controls have dwindled, but the crew members have started whispering that our vessel is haunted. The Tech-Priests' assurances that only the machine spirits' tempers are to blame are doing nothing to dissuade these ridiculous rumours."

languages.text: "Tekno Rahipler, makine ruhu yatıştırma ayinleri gerçekleştiriyor ve sorunun ruhların inatçılığından ve isyankârlığından kaynaklı olduğuna eminler. Raporları, bu olayların beklenen performans parametreleri dâhilinde olduğu iddiasında. Son birkaç gün içerisinde ısıl kontrollerde yaşanan arızalar hakkındaki şikâyetler azaldı ancak tayfalar arasında gemimize bir şeylerin musallat olduğuna dair söylentiler yayılıyor. Tekno Rahipler, bunların tek sorumlusunun makine ruhlarının kaprisleri olduğu konusunda herkesi temin ediyor. Gelgelelim bu sözleri, bu saçma sapan dedikoduları bertaraf etmeye yetmiyor."
languages.original_text: "The Tech-Priests are performing the rites of machine spirit pacification and remain convinced that the issues were caused by the spirits' obstinacy and defiance. Their reports claim the incidents remain well within the scope of expected performance parameters. Over the last few days, complaints about the malfunctioning thermal controls have dwindled, but the crew members have started whispering that our vessel is haunted. The Tech-Priests' assurances that only the machine spirits' tempers are to blame are doing nothing to dissuade these ridiculous rumours."
